name: Khana Mart
tag_list: online-food-ordering-india, restaurant-food-guide, restaurant-directory, restaurant-menus, table-booking-services-india, home-delivery-india
overview:
Khana Mart is an online food ordering and Table Booking website which allows customers to order food or Book Table in the simplest and most effective way. We help you find the right restaurants, cafes, and bistros in the city, to order your food online. Users can view the complete restaurant details including menu, photos, offers, ratings and reviews and more.

How it Started
Khana Mart was launched in 2013, by Bharat Technologies to offer a whole new way of ordering food online. Focussing on making restaurant owners happy and customers well-served, we have created a strong end-to-end system for online ordering…

Why Do We Exist

At Khana Mart.com, our main objective is to help customers save time, energy and money. This is the reason why we’ve invested in creating a website that allows them to order food or book a table in the most simple and effective way. We always want to keep our customers happy and updated with the latest offers and happenings about the best eat outs in their locality.

Our Vision and Mission

Our vision is to maintain the best standards in online food ordering industry by integrating the latest technologies, best customer support and seamless communication to make user’s dining experience the best it can be.

offices.address1: PLot No.25, Road No.12, Central Bank Colony
